    </svg>


css:


#tail{
            animation: wave 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            -webkit-animation: wave 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            -o-animation: wave 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            -moz-animation: wave 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            transform-origin: right;
            transform-box: fill-box;
        }
        @keyframes wave{
            0%{
                transform: rotateY(-30deg);
            }
            100%{
                transform: rotateY(30deg);
            }
        }
        @-moz-keyframes wave{
            0%{
                transform: rotate(-30deg);
            }
            100%{
                transform: rotateY(30deg);
            }
        }
        @-webkit-keyframes wave{
            0%{
                transform: rotate(-30deg);
            }
            100%{
                transform: rotateY(30deg);
            }
        }
        @-o-keyframes wave{
            0%{
                transform: rotate(-30deg);
            }
            100%{
                transform: rotateY(30deg);
            }
        }
